item.description:
The amazing Marcus Santos of AfroBrazil will be performing at one of the Tito Puente Latin Music Series free outdoor concert. He is the Brazilian connection of the Cuba Brazil Connection ensemble. Marcus' superb percussion skills and infectious energy will have you moving and grooving on the first beat.


In the event of rain, the show will be moved inside Villa Victoria Center for the Arts which is adjacent to the park.


Presented by IBA - Inquilinos Boricuas en Acción, Berklee College of Music, City of Boston ParkARTS and Mayor Thomas M. Menino

 

Please mention if you want to meet at 6 to buy take out from Estragon (700 Harrison Ave 02118) or Orinco (477 Shawmut Ave 02118).

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Cuba Brazil Connection - Outdoor Concert Thursday August 9th
